meta.name: description
meta.content: We are a rural consolidated school 10 miles south of Henryetta, OK on Highway 124 (Dustin Road).

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Henryetta, Weleetka, Dustin, Graham, Ryal, Dewar, Wetumka, small schools in Oklahoma, Wilson, Anchor glass plant,Okmulgee, OSU-IT, Chieftains, Hanna

div.p: Summer Hours 8:00 am to 3:00 pm Monday through Thursday. Closed 12:00 -12:30 for lunch.
AFTER SPRING BREAK, WE WILL RESUME HAVING SCHOOL ON MONDAYS UNTIL THE END OF THE SCHOOL YEAR.
